rules: Rule1: Under the condition that an employee is assigned a task for the project, the project deadline is approaching.
Rule2: If the employee has the necessary tools, then the employee has access to the software or has temporary access to the software.
Rule3: If the employee is a senior employee, then whenever that employee is assigned a task for the project, the employee has the necessary tools.
Rule4: The employee is a senior employee or the employee is a junior employee.
Rule5: In the case that the employee is a junior employee, if that employee is assigned a task for the project, then the employee has the necessary tools.
Rule6: If the team has a scheduled meeting in the conference room, the project is completed successfully.
Rule7: Either the team has a scheduled meeting in the conference room or the employee is approved for remote work.
Rule8: Under the condition that the employee is approved for remote work, the employee is provided with laptop equipment.
Rule9: Whenever the employee has video conferencing capabilities, the project is completed successfully.
Rule10: If the employee has communication access, then the employee has video conferencing capabilities.
Rule11: If the employee is provided with laptop equipment, then the employee is provided with headset equipment.
Rule12: If the company has IT support available, then whenever the employee is provided with headset equipment, the employee has communication access.
Rule13: The company has IT support available or the company has a self-service portal available.
Rule14: Provided that the company has a self-service portal available, if the employee is provided with headset equipment, the employee has communication access.
Rule15: Whenever the office has purchased ergonomic chair furniture, the employee has read the instructions.
Rule16: Provided that the ergonomic chair meets safety standards, the project is completed successfully.
Rule17: If the employee has assembled the furniture, then the ergonomic chair meets safety standards.
Rule18: If supervisor assistance is available to the employee, then the employee has previous experience with furniture assembly.
Rule19: Supervisor assistance is available to the employee or an online guide is available for furniture assembly.
Rule20: Provided that an online guide is available for furniture assembly, if the employee has read the instructions, then the employee has assembled the furniture.
Rule21: The department's budget has been exceeded or the project is completed successfully.
Rule22: If the software license is approved, then it is not the case that the project requires additional funding.
Rule23: Provided that the manager has approved the expense report, the department's budget has not been exceeded.
Rule24: Under the condition that the expense report is within policy, the manager has granted approval for the expense report.

Rule25: Provided that the finance department has reviewed the expense report, if the manager has granted approval for the expense report, then whenever the employee has submitted an expense report, the manager has approved the expense report.
Rule26: Overtime is authorized for the project or, if the project deadline is approaching, then the employee has access to the software or has temporary access to the software.
Rule27: A deadline extension is granted for the project or it is not the case that overtime is authorized for the project.
Rule28: If remote work monitoring is enabled by the company, then whenever the employee is approved for remote work, the employee has communication access.
Rule29: Under the condition that the company has a trust-based system, if the employee is approved for remote work, then the employee has communication access.
Rule30: If the company has a formal remote work policy, then remote work monitoring is enabled by the company or the company has a trust-based system.
Rule31: Either the company has a formal remote work policy or the company has a flexible remote work policy.
Rule32: If the department has budget approval, then if the software license is not approved, it is not the case that the software requires training.
Rule33: The department has budget approval or the department has external funding.
Rule34: Under the condition that the department has external funding, if the software license is not approved, then the software does not require training.
Rule35: Whenever the employee has access to the software, if the employee has completed training for the software, then the project is completed successfully.
Rule36: Provided that the employee has temporary access to the software, if the employee has completed training for the software, then the project is completed successfully.
Rule37: If it is not the case that if the budget proposal has approval from the manager then the project is completed successfully, then the project requires additional funding.

Rule38: If it is not the case that if the company has a flexible remote work policy then remote work monitoring is enabled by the company or the company has a trust-based system, then productivity tracking is implemented by the company.

Rule39: If it is not the case that if the company has a flexible remote work policy then remote work monitoring is enabled by the company or the company has a trust-based system, then productivity tracking is not implemented by the company.
Rule40: If the software license is not approved, then the software requires training.
Rule41: If it is not the case that the finance department has reviewed the expense report, then the expense report requires an audit.
Rule42: If the finance department has not reviewed the expense report, then it is not the case that the expense report requires an audit.
facts: Fact1: The budget proposal has approval from the manager.
Fact2: The employee is assigned a task for the project.
Fact3: The office has purchased ergonomic chair furniture.
Fact4: The employee has submitted an expense report.
Fact5: The expense report is within policy.
Fact6: The employee has completed training for the software.
Fact7: The employee does not have previous experience with furniture assembly.
Fact8: A deadline extension is not granted for the project.

question: The project has been completed successfully.
